Linear Gradient.description: Linear gradient where you specify all parameters.

Vertical Linear Gradient.description: Vertical linear gradient where you specify only the start and end colors.

Horizontal Linear Gradient.description: Horizontal linear gradient where you specify only the start and end colors.

Radial Gradient.description: Radial gradient where you specify all parameters but not offset.    SYNTAX: <radial-center>, <radius>, from( <color> ), to( <color> )

Radial Gradient Centered.description: Centered Radial Gradient where you specify radius and start and end colors.    SYNTAX: <radius>, from( <color> ), to( <color> )

Radial Gradient With Offset.description: Radial gradient where you specify all parameters.    SYNTAX: <radial-center>, <offset>, <radius>, from( <color> ), to( <color> )
